<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/65441</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>65441</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_517</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_517</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Incentro, exincentros, circunferencias inscrita y exinscritas</string>
            <string language="en">Incentre, excentre, incircles and excircles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Incentre, excentre, incircles und excircles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Incentre, excentre, incircles et excircles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Incentre, excentre, incircles e excircles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Incentre, excentre, incircles ed excircles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Incentre, excentre, incircles και excircles</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones la obtención y demostración de las coordenadas del incentro de un triángulo cualquiera. Se ofrecen tres demostraciones distintas del mismo hecho.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to calculate and verify the coordinates of the incentre of an arbitrary triangle. The unit provides three different proofs of the same fact.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">bisectriz</string>
            <string language="en">bisector</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">triángulo</string>
            <string language="en">triangle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">circunferencia inscrita</string>
            <string language="en">incircle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">incentro</string>
            <string language="en">incentre</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, die Koordinaten des incentre eines willkürlichen 
Dreiecks zu errechnen und zu überprüfen. Die Maßeinheit 
liefert drei unterschiedliche Beweise der gleichen Tatsache.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations de calculer et vérifier les coordonnées de l'incentre 
d'une triangle arbitraire. L'unité fournit trois preuves 
différentes du même fait.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações calcular e
verificar as coordenadas do incentre de um triângulo arbitrário. 
A unidade fornece três provas diferentes do mesmo fato.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
calcolare e verificare le coordinate del incentre di un triangolo 
arbitrario. L'unità fornisce tre prove differenti dello stesso 
fatto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να υπολογίσει και να ελέγξει τις συντεταγμένες του incentre 
ενός αυθαίρετου τριγώνου. Η μονάδα χορηγεί τρεις 
διαφορετικές αποδείξεις του ίδιου γεγονότος.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">bisector</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dreieck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">incircle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">incentre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">bisector</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">triangle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">incircle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">incentre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">bisector</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">triângulo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">incircle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">incentre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">bisector</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">triangolo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">incircle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">incentre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διαχωριστικός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τρίγωνο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">incircle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">incentre</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
